<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - Creates a logical reader for every binary file in the command line,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - Prints and compares the logical views.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The supported binary formats are: ELF, Mach-O and CodeView.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
